song.title: Solar Empire [Seems Though Kewl] [Yet Another Solar Track!]
song.info:
MOS 6581 SID Stationi-simmo. o/
-> wget --no-check-certificate -i https://music.it-flash.de/solar_empire__seems_though_kewl__-yet-another-solar-track__.mp3
<--- Remove Check 'Has the SSL cert. an official authenticator. (Just me!) And also -i for having an I-Frame. (You don't want to download a txt-like file)
Greetings, flashinat0r! ;)
